pli-tv-bi-pm:4.1: There is no ti in the Pali at the end of the paragraph, but quotation marks seem required because there is a shift of speaker.
pli-tv-bi-pm:5.1: This is where the recitation of the Pātimokkha begins, thus the open quote. The end quote is found at the end of the recitation. There are headings in between that should not be included within the quotes. To simplify the editing process, I have not separated these out.
pli-tv-bi-pm:7.5: I have ignored the ti after dhārayāmi here and below. It is not found in all versions of the Pātimokkha, and it does not fit the context.
